text: Aey eman walo!aisi baaten mat poocho kay kay agar tum per zahir ker di jayen to tumhen na gawar ho aur agar tum zamaanaay-e-nuzool-e-quran mein inn baaton ko poocho gay to tum per zahir ker di jayen gi sawalaat-e-guzishta Allah ney moaf ker diye aur Allah bari maghfirat wala bara hilm wala hai
